name: Crawly Nights
description:
You are a worm creature - during the night you grow and must consume entire populations to add links to your form... but during the day, you shrink and must avoid the sunlight to survive.

~

Move the mouse inside the screen, and the worm creature will follow.

0 / - / + to control the volume.

~ 

Made in some 5 hours (2 of which were used on writing a design doc and preparing for submission) for TriJam 164 (my first TriJam!).
